title: Great Zimbabwe
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 1,862 words, Level Z1 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1140L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and U
description: Between the eleventh and fifteenth century, an incredible city took shape-Great Zimbabwe in East Africa. Its massive stone ruins present many mysteries to scholars, including who was responsible for building it and the purposes of its well-constructed walls and buildings.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
